description:
This course will teach you how to create a Facebook business page. The course is designed for the beginner and covers the basics to get your page up and running in just over 30 minutes.

You will learn how quick and easy it is to actually create a page. From there you will discover:

How to add/replace your profile and cover photos, (profile and cover sizes)

How to add your first post, add photos and video

How to edit the about page

How to boost a page

Page settings

At the end of the course you will be able to create and manage your own Facebook page.

This course was created in October 2015, so you get an up to date course.
title: How to Create a Facebook Business Page
